rows.label: qev015701_MSG0001
rows.name: Er...e-excuse me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0002
rows.name:
Sorry to bother you, and I know you're terribly busy,
but is there any way you might help with a rather
urgent request?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0003
rows.name:
I promise I won't take much of your time. Heck, I don't
have much of my own to spend taking up yours!
...Er, sorry. Getting off track.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0004
rows.name:
Anyway! I know I should be running this request
through official channels and all that, so I'm sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0005
rows.name:
But there's just no TIME! I'm desperate at this point,
and I'll literally take any help I can get. Er, n-not to
say you're just anybody! You're great! Ha ha...ha.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0006
rows.name:
Look, I know I must sound completely bonkers,
but just hear me out, okay? That's all I ask.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_JNK0010
rows.name: Listen

rows.label: qev015701_SEL0011
rows.name: Hear what Satie has to say.

rows.label: qev015701_JNK0020
rows.name: Reassure

rows.label: qev015701_SEL0021
rows.name: Attempt to calm Satie down.

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0007
rows.name: R-really? You're going to...listen to me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0008
rows.name:
Oh, man! What are the odds the very first person I
asked would help me out, huh? Like, nine to one?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0009
rows.name:
I'm shy, you see, and I'd about worked myself into a
panic thinking I'd have to keep approaching strangers.
What with the staring and the awkwardness and—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0010
rows.name:
Huh? I... Oh. Right. Sorry.
That probably didn't make a whole lot of sense, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0011
rows.name: Okay, let me pull it together here...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0012
rows.name:
Breathe iiiin...and out. Iiiiiiiiin...and out...
People like me. People like me. It's all okay...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0013
rows.name: Thank you. My head's a lot clearer now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0014
rows.name: ...Er, what were we talking about?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0015
rows.name: Oh! Right![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0016
rows.name:
Yes, so I need you to deliver some supplies to a BLADE
team in the field.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0017
rows.name:
I'm a mechanic, you see. Specializing in Skells.
I tend to head up a lot of important projects.
...Er, sorry. Did that sound braggy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0018
rows.name:
Anyway, I just got a call from a team that's always
been really nice to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0019
rows.name:
They asked me to bring them supplies so they can
do a field repair of their Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0020
rows.name:
Apparently something called a whimsical duoguill
attacked them after they left on a mission,
and now they're stranded out there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0021
rows.name:
I pride myself on customer service, but me wandering
around outside the city is just...no. Bad idea.
Bad, bad idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0022
rows.name:
Especially with the whimsical duoguill that broke
their Skell still kicking around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0023
rows.name:
Much as I wanted to help, I'm just a mechanic.
There was only so much I could do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0024
rows.name:
But on the other hand, the thought of those poor Skells
lying there all beat up just broke my heart![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0025
rows.name:
So I gathered some adventurey stuff and left town,
but then kind of panicked about what to do next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0026
rows.name:
The only sane plan I could come up with was asking
someone else for help—and then you came along!
It's like magic, only not.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0027
rows.name: Anyway, I know I should post this to Mission Control...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0028
rows.name:
But I don't have time for rules, man! I can't just stand
around filling out paperwork and cutting red tape
or whatever![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0029
rows.name:
Oh, and I'll pay you, of course. Or actually the leader
of the team you'd be rescuing will. Er, I hope.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0030
rows.name:
At any rate, they're really in trouble, so if you could
get these supplies to them, I'd really appreciate it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0031
rows.name:
Those poor Skells are still stuck out there.
All banged up and exposed to the elements...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0032
rows.name:
Please get those repair supplies to them as soon as
you can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0033
rows.name: I won't be able to sleep until I know they're safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0034
rows.name: Did you get those repair supplies to Myles?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0035
rows.name:
What? They're not coming back until the
whimsical duoguill has been taken care of?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0036
rows.name:
How long are those poor Skells going to be stuck out
in the elements with just Myles's slapdash patch job?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015701_MSG0037
rows.name:
Please get rid of that whimsical duoguill so those Skells
can receive some proper maintenance. They have
feelings too, you know![ST:wait ]
